testcase.classname: As a registered user (student/parent), I want to have access to the login page from the homepage
testcase.name: On the "userlogin" page, it should be verified
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the 'url' address....................................passed When The user clicks on the Login button....................................passed And The user enters their username in to the username textbox...............passed And The user enters their password in to the password textbox...............passed When The user clicks on the Sign In button..................................passed Then The user verifies that they can log in to their panels by enterin their (previously registered) information..passed
